name: Elemental Ruins
description:
Elemental Ruins is a game based around the idea of balance, the game tries its best to emulate perfect balance based on a level progression system. The player should be able to seamlessly kill enemies of a lower level, provide a challenge for enemies of the same level, and struggle to survive when faced against an enemy of a higher level.

Features: 
Saving/Loading
Level Progression
Stats
Old-school RPG style
Battle System
